workList.title: Living Kavita Loca
workList.description: This site (livingkavitaloca.com) a generated static JS file. It is statically hosted via AWS in an s3 bucket and uses Route53 as DNS and uses CloudFront as a CDN to serve this site securely (and for pretty cheap). It's open source and its on my github! Check it out

workList.title: LinkEverywhere
workList.description: Created LinkEverywhere as a Hackathon project with a designer (Given 48 hours). Mobile App Idea was designed to allow you see what was playing on kiosks near you.

workList.title: Royal Baby Campaign in London
workList.description: Took Hackathon project, EmojiBarometer and Implemented Play and Java backend with Swarm pipeline and made it an official product - a campaign for Meghan and Harry's Royal Baby in London.

workList.title: LinkNYC FourSquare Campaign
workList.description: Created the LinkNYC FourSquare Campaign that recommends bars, restaurants, outdoors spots ,based on latitude and longitude, walking distance, weather, time of day and  walking radius.
